members.name: Alex Chen
members.bio: Started coding freshman year, now building web apps with React and Node.js. Love helping beginners debug their first programs! Currently interning at a startup.

members.name: Sarah Johnson
members.bio: Sophomore passionate about making technology accessible and beautiful. Leading our beginner-friendly workshop series. Always happy to review your portfolio!

members.name: Marcus Williams
members.bio: Switched from business to tech junior year through online courses and community support. Now a senior SWE intern at Microsoft. Proof that it's never too late to start!

members.name: Emily Zhang
members.bio: Grad school bound! Love using Python for data analysis and machine learning. Running study groups for math-heavy CS courses. Ask me about research opportunities!

members.name: Jordan Kim
members.bio: Fascinated by cybersecurity and ethical hacking. Organizing our CTF team and security workshops. Former liberal arts major who discovered coding through a random elective!

members.name: Maya Patel
members.bio: Building apps that help with mental health and student wellness. Combining psychology insights with technology. Great person to talk to about interdisciplinary projects!

members.name: Tyler Brooks
members.bio: Just started my coding journey! Learning Python in CS101 and loving it. Looking for study buddies and project partners. Future goal: contribute to open source projects!

members.name: Zoe Martinez
members.bio: Indie game developer working on my thesis project - a puzzle game about climate change. Also teach intro programming workshops because I love seeing the 'aha!' moments.
